alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 10:25PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Cheyenne County in northwestern Kansas, northwestern Hitchcock and eastern Dundy Counties in southwestern Nebraska through 1000 PM MDT/1100 PM CDT/... At 924 PM MDT/1024 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles west of Palisade to 8 miles east of Haigler. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Palisade. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
